quote: The time to read Madame Bovary is when your romantic hopes and desires have crashed, and you will believe that your future relationships will have disappointing - even devastating - consequences.
quote_letters: THE TIME TO READ MADAME BOVARY IS WHEN YOUR ROMANTIC HOPES AND DESIRES HAVE CRASHED AND YOU WILL BELIEVE THAT YOUR FUTURE RELATIONSHIPS WILL HAVE DISAPPOINTING - EVEN DEVASTATING - CONSEQUENCES
